Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 24th overall pick, by Minnesota in 1973...
Injured on 8/6/1976 with a Blister On Finger, out for 4 days...
Earned first career win on 5/7/1977...
Won World Series with Minnesota in 1977...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1977, going 15-11, 2.87 ERA...
Won World Series with Minnesota in 1978...
Was selected to the 1979 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1980 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1980, winning 2 games with a 2.08 ERA...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/8/1982, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Pitched NO-HITTER against California on 9/18/1982, striking out 3...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/1982, going 5-1, 0.85...
Won World Series with Minnesota in 1982...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 8/1/1983, going 4-0, 0.62...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/1983, going 5-0, 1.42...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/9/1984, winning 2 games with a 2.08 ERA...
Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
Won Cy Young Award in 1984, going 24-5, 2.25 ERA...
Had first career hit on 4/9/1985, off John Candelaria (BAL)...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/1985, going 4-0, 0.37...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/1988, going 7-0, 1.27...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/19/1988, winning 2 games with a 0.52 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/1988, going 6-0, 1.04...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Won World Series with Minnesota in 1988...
Won Cy Young Award in 1988, going 23-8, 2.53 ERA...
Injured on 6/8/1989 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/1989, going 5-0, 0.49...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 9/1/1989, going 4-1, 1.48...
Signed as a free agent by California on 2/1/1991 to a 1-year deal worth $4,123,456 per year...
